content.title: Bangalore and Navi Mumbai's Leading Award-Winning Dental Clinic.
paragraphs: Innovative Dental Solutions embodies the ethos of being customer-friendly, cost-effective, and comprehensive in delivering exceptional dental care.
With over 10,000 successful cosmetic and implant cases completed over the past decade, we have proudly established ourselves as one of the best dental clinics in Bangalore.

Our treatments are provided by highly specialized MDS doctors in a fully sterilized environment. With completely transparent treatment charges, you can walk into our clinic with confidence and peace of mind at any time.

ARS Innovative Dental Solutions has been independently assessed and accredited by the Indian Health Organization (IHO). We adhere to the principles and practices of clinical governance as defined by the IHO, ensuring the highest standards of quality and care.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: We value the power of diversity, bringing together individuals with unique skills, perspectives, and ideas to foster creativity and innovation.

leaders.name: Dr. M. Pasha
leaders.qualifications:
BDS, CCOID (Author-KNOW ENDO, DO ENDO)
Mentor, Educator & Public Speaker
leaders.bio: Dr. M Pasha has been into dental profession for 22 years. He has done his graduation from Al Ameen Dental College Bijapur. He runs a successful Multispeciality Dental practice, Implant centre & Academy at Bangalore and Navi Mumbai. He has insatiable interest in teaching and mentoring and conducting Hands on courses on General Dentistry, Prosthodontics and Orthodontics. He has authored & published books on Endodontics 'Know Endo DO Endo' and a book on philosophy 'Six Lines on Lane' Currently available worldwide on Amazon and Atithi books.

leaders.name: Dr. Akash Mandaloy
leaders.bio: Dr. Akash Mandalay is a renowned Implantologist and Periodontist in India. He graduated from Rural Dental College Loni and completed post-graduation in Periodontics at Modern Dental College, Indore. He also earned a Post Graduate Diploma in Implantology from Chanvaz Institute, France, and is a certified Implantologist from Sharad Pawar Dental College, Wardha. Passionate about education, he conducts courses in Periodontics, Implantology, and general practice. He has served as an Associate Professor at Sri Aurobindo College of Dentistry, Indore, and is a consultant at various dental clinics and hospitals across India. He runs a successful practice in Khopoli, Maharashtra.

footerDesc.title: Your perfect smile is just a click away!

profile.title: Our Profile
profile.description: Featuring highly skilled and trained dentists equipped with state-of-the-art technology, The Leading Dental Clinic in Bangalore and Navi Mumbai.
paragraphs: ARS Innovative Dental Solutions was established in 2001 with a commitment to providing exceptional dental care. Over the years, our journey has been driven by the evolving need to offer personalized, high-quality treatment to every individual. To enhance patient experience and ensure the constant presence of skilled dental professionals, we consolidated our services into a single state-of-the-art center. Our clinic is equipped with the latest technology and advanced dental equipment, allowing us to deliver comprehensive care across various specialties—all under one roof.

With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, ARS Innovative Dental Solutions provides advanced dental care. Dr. M Pasha, with 22 years in the field, runs a Multispeciality Dental Practice, Implant Centre & Academy in Bangalore and Navi Mumbai. A passionate mentor, he conducts courses in General Dentistry, Prosthodontics, and Orthodontics and has authored books on Endodontics and Philosophy.

Dr. Akash Mandalay, a leading Implantologist and Periodontist, holds a Post Graduate Diploma in Implantology from Chanvaz Institute, France, and has taught as an Associate Professor. He specializes in Periodontics, Implantology, and General Practice and runs a successful practice in Khopoli, Maharashtra.

ARS Innovative Dental Solutions was founded with a commitment to comprehensive treatment planning, prioritizing sterilization, patient education, and personalized care. From the very beginning, we have focused on delivering high-quality dental treatments with thorough consultations and dedicated follow-ups, ensuring the best outcomes for our patients.
